metadata.title: CVE-2020-29600 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
In AWStats through 7.7, cgi-bin/awstats.pl?config= accepts an absolutepathname, even though it was intended to only read a file in the/etc/awstats/awstats.conf format. NOTE: this issue exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000501.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-29600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.6+dfsg-2ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awstats package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.6+dfsg-2ubuntu0.20.04.1').
